query: Describe the brand personality and communication style
response:
Based on the provided data, @fentybeauty's brand personality is engaging and focuses on beauty and cosmetics.

The communication style is playful and trendy, often referencing Rihanna (@badgalriri) and current trends. For example, the post "Sorry, we can't come to the phone right now... we're swatching the NEW shades of Trace'd Out Pencil Lip Liner ​" received 5,834 likes and 51 comments, totaling 5,885 in engagement. Another example is the post "POV: It's 2018 and @badgalriri just dropped THE glowy product of the summer " which garnered 7,160 likes and 81 comments, totaling 7,241 in engagement. The post "How we’re showing up to the function: " received 6,720 likes and 60 comments, totaling 6,780 in engagement. The post "Born to dew your body right ️‍" received 29,447 likes and 141 comments, totaling 29,588 in engagement.

The most engaging post, "Sp'oil your lips like @badgalriri ", further reinforces this, achieving 67,131 likes and 437 comments, totaling 67,568 in engagement. This highlights the brand's connection to Rihanna and its focus on lip products.
